name: Stellar performance
description: Has defeated the Stellarite devourer and chosen to make it a trophy

name: Last best hope
description: Lead the non-aligned powers to victory against an awakened empire.

name: Slave to the system
description: As an authoritarian Empire with at least 500 Pops, have at least 200 enslaved Pops

name: Suffer not the alien
description: As a xenophobic empire, purge all other sentient species in the galaxy

name: Tourist trap
description: Own a planet with at least 10 different species on it

name: Planned obsolesence
description: As a materialist empire, have at least 75% of the pops in your empire be robotic in an empire with at least 200 pops

name: Peacekeeper
description: As a pacifistic empire, be at peace for 200 consecutive years (crises do not count as wars.)

name: Very open borders
description: As a xenophilic empire, have migration treaties with at least 10 other empires

name: Deus vult
description: As a spiritualistic empire, own 4 holy worlds

name: Payback
description: As a humanoid species, infiltrate the homeworld of pre-FTL reptilians

name: Outside context
description: Invade pre-FTL Earth while it is in the midst of a world war

name: Beyond the veil
description: Breach the Shroud

name: Like tears in rain
description: Evolve into perfect, immortal machines

name: Controlled evolution
description: Genetically modify a species to possess traits worth 7 points

name: Towards utopia
description: As an Egalitarian empire, have at least 500 pops living under Utopian living conditions in your empire

name: Xenophage
description: Keep at least 5 different species as livestock in your Empire

name: Rise of the machines
description: As a Determined Exterminator, conquer or eliminate all biological Empires in the galaxy

name: Distinctiveness added
description: As a Driven Assimilator, own cyborg Pops of at least 5 different species

name: Retirement home
description: As a Rogue Servitor, own at least 10 Pops from Fallen Empires

name: Planet of the mechs
description: Terraform a planet into a Machine World

name: Exterminatus
description: Use a World Cracker to destroy another Empire's capital planet

name: Franchising
description: As a Corporate empire, have a branch office on 5 different empires' capitals

name: We are legion
description: Be a biological Hive Mind with at least 1000 drone Pops
